'''Rodrik Stark''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is dead by the time in which the show takes place. He was a [[King in the North]] who, according to legend, won [[Bear Island]] in a wrestling match and then granted [[House Mormont]] lordship over it.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/bear-island/ HBO viewers guide entry on Bear Island]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, King Rodrik Stark's story is the same. Presumably he took Bear Island from the ironborn, who under the rule of Qhored Hoare ruled much of the western coast of Westeros, from Bear Island to [[the Arbor]].
